description: '''David Vanian''' (born '''David Lett''', 12 October 1956) is an English [[Rock music|rock]] musician, and lead singer of the [[punk rock]] band [[The Damned (band)|the Damned]]. Formed in 1976 in [[London]], the Damned were the first British punk band to release a [[Single (music)|single]], release an album, have a record hit the UK charts, and tour the United States. With a fluid line-up since their founding, Vanian has been the only ever-present member. Vanian's [[baritone]] singing voice, dark lyrics and [[vampire]]-themed costumes, were a major influence on the [[goth subculture]].
